flex items-center justify-between py-4

div.p: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you were looking for. Here's a few things you could try:

ul.li: If you typed the URL directly, make sure the spelling is correct.
Visit ourhomepageas the link is possibly outdated.

div.class: flex lg:flex-row flex-col gap-5 lg:items-center mt-8
